title: When is Off-Policy Evaluation (Reward Modeling) Useful in Contextual Bandits? A Data-Centric Perspective
details: H Sun, AJ Chan, N Seedat, A Hüyük, M van der Schaar - Journal of Data-centric …, 2024
abstract: Evaluating the value of a hypothetical target policy with only a logged dataset is important but challenging. On the one hand, it brings opportunities for safe policy improvement under high-stakes scenarios like clinical guidelines. On the other hand …
